nodes.text:
Chief Bellows was a former clone trooper who suffered
severe head trauma just before Order 66 was issued by Chancellor Palpatine. He was found by Lira Hardin, who watched over him. Once he was awake, he convinced her that he did not understand why his brothers were behaving as they were, and so she persuaded him to go into hiding things were sorted.

Over the years, Bellows has put on weight, and has been named security chief of Foundry Four. While he occasionally breaks up scuffles and domestic disputes, his real job is to ensure that the shady customers parading to Xorrn for ship upgrades pay their bills. While not formerly on the Clan Assembly, he is frequently included in meetings to provide security input.
